name: ManrikiMania
description:
ManrikiMania

A arcade style top-down shooter with a electrified chain weapon inspired by the manrikigusari, made for the GMTK GameJam 2021.

Controls

WASD to move

Left Mouse Button to throw your electrified chain weapon

This is my first GameJam entry. I wanted to add more enemies and sound effects/music but haven't had the time to do so :(

Let me know in the comments what you think.

Credits

Particle Pack from Kenney (CC0)

2D Explosion Animation from Sinestesia (CC0)

Audiowide Font from Astigmatic (Open Font License)

Everything else was done by me.
